fxInfo_citation: V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: Legal voting rights can be compromised by a number of issues (for example intimidation, insecurity, prohibitive laws or practices, impersonation, or by social/religious norms and practices). Do not consider registration practices that place the burden on the voter to take action to register ahead of the election.
fxInfo_question: In this national election, what percentage (%) of male citizens who were legally entitled to vote was prevented from doing so?
name: v2elmalsuf
